member.name: T:AutoMapper.Mapper
member.summary: Main entry point for AutoMapper, for both creating maps and performing maps.

member.name: M:AutoMapper.Mapper.Map``1(System.Object)
member.summary: Execute a mapping from the source object to a new destination object. The source type is inferred from the source object.

member.name: M:AutoMapper.Mapper.Map``1(System.Object,System.Action{AutoMapper.IMappingOperationOptions})
member.summary: Execute a mapping from the source object to a new destination object with supplied mapping options.

member.name: M:AutoMapper.Mapper.Map``2(``0)
member.summary: Execute a mapping from the source object to a new destination object.
member.typeparam: Source type to use, regardless of the runtime type

member.name: M:AutoMapper.Mapper.Map``2(``0,``1)
member.summary: Execute a mapping from the source object to the existing destination object.
member.returns: The mapped destination object, same instance as the object

member.name: M:AutoMapper.Mapper.Map``2(``0,``1,System.Action{AutoMapper.IMappingOperationOptions})
member.summary: Execute a mapping from the source object to the existing destination object with supplied mapping options.
member.returns: The mapped destination object, same instance as the object

member.name: M:AutoMapper.Mapper.Map``2(``0,System.Action{AutoMapper.IMappingOperationOptions})
member.summary: Execute a mapping from the source object to a new destination object with supplied mapping options.

member.summary: Execute a mapping from the source object to a new destination object with explicit objects

member.summary: Execute a mapping from the source object to a new destination object with explicit objects and supplied mapping options.

member.summary: Execute a mapping from the source object to existing destination object with explicit objects
member.returns: Mapped destination object, same instance as the object

member.returns: Mapped destination object, same instance as the object

member.summary: Create a map between the and types and execute the map

member.summary: Create a map between the and types and execute the map to the existing destination object

member.name: M:AutoMapper.Mapper.DynamicMap``1(System.Object)
member.summary: Create a map between the object and types and execute the map. Source type is inferred from the source object .

member.name: M:AutoMapper.Mapper.DynamicMap(System.Object,System.Type,System.Type)
member.summary: Create a map between the and types and execute the map. Use this method when the source and destination types are not known until runtime.

member.name: M:AutoMapper.Mapper.DynamicMap(System.Object,System.Object,System.Type,System.Type)
member.summary: Create a map between the and types and execute the map to the existing destination object. Use this method when the source and destination types are not known until runtime.

member.name: M:AutoMapper.Mapper.Initialize(System.Action{AutoMapper.IConfiguration})
member.summary: Initializes the mapper with the supplied configuration. Runtime optimization complete after this method is called. This is the preferred means to configure AutoMapper.

member.summary: Configuration starter for specific source types
